item.title: Report X-2024072374
item.description:
Report X-2024072374

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-07T15:13:00+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-29
  • City: HOLBROOK
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: This Hazmat Package was brought to attention during the outbound sort. The admin proceeded to put gloves on for further inspection. This hazmat package was leaking out of the bottom seam where the soldering point is, the leaking is slow and not obvious but residue was present on the bottom of the drum. The leaking liquid was contained from the start and no residue of any kind was found on the floor. While handling the drum, the admin placed a plastic bag in a bin to ensure safety to make sure that the leak was contained. No individuals were harmed or present near the hazmat.

item.title: Report X-2024080135
item.description:
Report X-2024080135

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-06T15:14:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-01
  • City: HOLBROOK
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The box was found wet on the trailer in the am sort. The package handler called over an admin who brought over a red plastic hazmat bucket, a hazmat bag and gloves. The admin put the bag inside the bucket and used the gloves to put the box inside the hazmat bin. the box was not actively leaking. The box was just wet. Upon inspection saw the cap on the one plastic 5 L container was loose and it looked like 4 oz of liquid could have leaked out of the plastic container into the box. There was no liquid on the floor of the trailer.

item.title: Report X-2024072247
item.description:
Report X-2024072247

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-06T15:14:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-26
  • City: SYRACUSE
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: QA got called to door 15 on the NEW unload for a leaking hazmat. QA brought a leaker tote with a hazmat bag and gloves to the door and quickly contained the hazmat and brought it back to the QA area to start the hazmat process on it.
